caption.center: DASON UDAC and GWENDOLYN N. UDAC, Trustee for the Alfredo Udac

opinion.posture: CERTIORARI TO THE INTERMEDIATE COURT OF APPEALS (CIV. NO. 02-1-0260)
opinion.attorneys: Dwayne S. Lerma Jo Anne Goya (Lerma Goya); Steve K. Hisaka Gail Y. Cosgrove (Hisaka Yoshida Cosgrove); and Jeffrey L. Fisher (Davis Wright Tremaine LLP) (admitted pro hac vice) for petitioners/ plaintiffs-appellees/ cross-appellants.

center.underline: ORDER REJECTING APPLICATION FOR WRIT OF CERTIORARI

opinion.opinion_byline:
By: ACOBA, J., for the court.[fn1]
[fn1] Considered by: Moon, C.J., Nakayama, Acoba, Duffy, and Circuit Court Border in place of Recktenwald, J., recused.
opinion.opinion_text: The Application for Writ of Certiorari filed on December 7, 2009 by Petitioners/Plaintiffs-Appellees/Cross-Appellants Dason Udac and Gwendolyn N. Udac, Trustee for the Aflredo Udac Revocable Living Trust, is hereby rejected.Page 1
